cause.description:
A concert given in October on the SUNY Geneseo campus by the A Capella groups: Hips n' Harmony, Southside boys, Exit 8 and NARD. All proceeds go to MADD Rochester ( Mothers Against Drunk Driving)
PLEASE KEEP YOUR EYE OPEN FOR THE CONCERT DATE AND TIME!
1. Driving after even one drink is wrong.
2. Drunk driving affects everyone.
3. We need to do what we can to bring awareness to our communities to save lives.
cause.mission: Bring awareness to how detrimental drunk driving is.
cause.name: Geneseo Musicians against drunk driving
